The name of the worker's vaccination status.
Contains the Vaccination Status and their associated data.
The custom text that workers view when they attest to their Vaccination Status.
If true, displays a Vaccination Details section on the Add My Vaccination and Add Vaccination tasks. Enables workers to enter the manufacturer, vaccination event type, and date.
If true, the worker is marked as Fully Vaccinated when they select this Vaccination Status.
If true, the status is inactivated. You might have downstream impacts if there's existing vaccination data.

Attestation_Text.description: The custom text that workers view when they attest to their Vaccination Status.

Collect_Vaccine_Detail.description: If true, displays a Vaccination Details section on the Add My Vaccination and Add Vaccination tasks. Enables workers to enter the manufacturer, vaccination event type, and date.

Fully_Vaccinated.description: If true, the worker is marked as Fully Vaccinated when they select this Vaccination Status.

Vaccination_Status_ID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Vaccination_Status_Inactive.description: If true, the status is inactivated. You might have downstream impacts if there's existing vaccination data.

Vaccination_Status_Name.description: The name of the worker's vaccination status.

Vaccination_Status_Reference_Vaccination.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Vaccination_Status_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
